definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)

sentences.english: Raise your lower eyelids if you can.
sentences.chinese: 擡起你的下眼瞼，如果你可以的話。

sentences.english: In lower eyelid surgery, the incision is made just below the lashes in the skin's natural crease.
sentences.chinese: 下眼瞼手術時，沿睫毛下皮膚皺褶方向切開。

sentences.english: Little droplets of white pus sneaked out of an opening beneath the bottom lid of her eye.
sentences.chinese: 幾滴白膿從她的下眼瞼下面滲了出來。

sentences.english: Whether you undergo surgery to improve vision or appearance, eyelid drooping can recur over time.
sentences.chinese: 下眼瞼手術時，沿睫毛下皮膚皺褶方向切開。

sentences.english: Begin to be drawn to eye end in next palpebral 1/3 place next.
sentences.chinese: 然後在下眼瞼的三分之一處開始向眼尾畫。

sentences.english: Will be paid under the eyelid skin premature relaxation for the price.
sentences.chinese: 將以付出下眼瞼皮膚過早鬆弛爲慘重代價。

sentences.english: Heat some olive oil and apply some under your lower eyelid using cotton sticks.
sentences.chinese: 加熱一些橄欖油，用棉花棒塗在你的下眼瞼的低處。

sentences.english: Tense your lower and upper eyelids.
Will be paid under the eyelid skin premature relax for the price.
sentences.chinese: 將以付出下眼瞼皮膚過早鬆弛爲沉重代價。

sentences.english: Using forceps, the lateral lower eyelid is retracted away from the globe to expose the lateral canthus tendon.
sentences.chinese: 使用鑷子將外側下眼瞼同眼球分離以便暴露外眥肌腱。

definition: to have dark circles under one's eyes/to have eyes like a panda
to twitch/to throb/a spasm/to extract and use
